#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;


  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  if(!GetRaftServer().is_leader_){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  // formatting command as Marshallable
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;

  // sending command to raft server
  uint64_t index = -1, term = -1;
  GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);

  //Coroutine::CreateRun([this, oid, k, v](){
    for(int i = 0; i < 50; i++){
      Coroutine::Sleep(KV_TIMEOUT_DURATION/50);
      auto cmd_id = std::find(processed_cmds_.begin(), processed_cmds_.end(), to_string(oid));
      if (cmd_id != processed_cmds_.end()) {
        processed_cmds_.erase(cmd_id);
        //Print("Successfully put (%s, %s)", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  //});
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  if(!GetRaftServer().is_leader_){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  // formatting command as Marshallable
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;

  // sending command to raft server
  uint64_t index = -1, term = -1;
  GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);

  //Coroutine::CreateRun([this, oid, k, v](){
    for(int i = 0; i < 50; i++){
      Coroutine::Sleep(KV_TIMEOUT_DURATION/50);
      auto cmd_id = std::find(processed_cmds_.begin(), processed_cmds_.end(), to_string(oid));
      if (cmd_id != processed_cmds_.end()) {
        processed_cmds_.erase(cmd_id);
        //Print("Successfully appended (%s, %s)", k.c_str(), v.c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  //});
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  if(!GetRaftServer().is_leader_){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  // formatting command as Marshallable
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd = s;

  // sending command to raft server
  uint64_t index = -1, term = -1;
  GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  
  //Coroutine::CreateRun([this, s, k, v](){
    for(int i = 0; i < 50; i++){
      Coroutine::Sleep(KV_TIMEOUT_DURATION/50);
      auto cmd_id = std::find(processed_cmds_.begin(), processed_cmds_.end(), to_string(oid));
      if (cmd_id != processed_cmds_.end()) {
        processed_cmds_.erase(cmd_id);
        if(GetRaftServer().is_leader_){


          *v = state_[k];
        }
        //Print("Successfully got %s = %s", k.c_str(), v->c_str());
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  //});
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  string oid = v->data_[0].c_str();
  string type = v->data_[1].c_str();
  string key = v->data_[2].c_str();
  //Print("(%ld) Recieved command (%s, %s, %s)", GetRaftServer().id_, oid.c_str(), type.c_str(), key.c_str());
  if(type == "put"){
    string arg = v->data_[3].c_str();
    state_[key] = arg;

  }else if(type == "append"){
    string arg = v->data_[3].c_str();
    if (state_.find(key) != state_.end()) {
      state_[key] += arg;
    }else{
      state_[key] = arg;
    }

  }
  processed_cmds_.push_back(oid);
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
